metadata.description: MNE for Claude Code skills and plugins

plugins.name: autoreject
plugins.description: Autoreject documentation for automated artifact rejection in MEG/EEG data. Provides automated methods to reject bad trials and interpolate bad sensors.

plugins.name: mne-connectivity
plugins.description: MNE-Connectivity documentation for functional and effective connectivity analysis in MEG/EEG data. Covers coherence, phase-locking, granger causality, and connectivity visualization.

plugins.name: mne-core
plugins.description: MNE-Python core documentation for MEG/EEG neurophysiological data analysis. Covers preprocessing, source estimation, time-frequency analysis, statistics, machine learning, visualization, and artifact rejection.

plugins.name: mne-icalabel
plugins.description: MNE-ICALabel documentation for automatic Independent Component Analysis (ICA) labeling. Helps identify and classify ICA components as brain, muscle, eye, heart, line noise, or other artifacts.

plugins.name: mne-microstates
plugins.description: MNE-Microstates GitHub repository for microstate analysis in EEG data. Provides tools for clustering, segmentation, and analysis of EEG microstates.
